import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Assuming model_metrics is a DataFrame containing the metrics
model_metrics = pd.read_csv('path/to/your/model_metrics.csv')

# Displaying the metrics
model_metrics_summary = model_metrics.describe()

# Plotting the metrics
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.bar(model_metrics['Metric'], model_metrics['Value'], color='skyblue')
plt.title('Model Performance Metrics')
plt.xlabel('Metrics')
plt.ylabel('Values')
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
